name: Hotel Cambay Grand
address: Plot No X-22, 23 & 24, GIDC, Sector 25, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382044
description: A luxurious hotel offering comfortable accommodations and modern amenities.

reviews.comment: Great experience! The rooms were spacious and clean. The staff was very courteous and helpful.
Nice hotel with good facilities. The food at the restaurant was delicious.

name: Fortune Inn Haveli
description: A contemporary hotel with elegant rooms and excellent dining options.

reviews.comment: Enjoyed my stay here. The room was comfortable and the staff was attentive.
Decent hotel. Could improve on cleanliness.

name: Platinum Inn
description: A budget-friendly hotel offering comfortable stays and basic amenities.

reviews.comment: Value for money. Rooms were clean and staff was friendly.
Average hotel. Could use some refurbishment.

name: Hotel The Grand Pritam
description: An upscale hotel known for its luxurious accommodations and top-notch service.

reviews.comment: Absolutely fantastic! The rooms were luxurious and the staff went above and beyond to make our stay memorable.
Highly recommend this hotel. Great service and amenities.

name: Hotel Isher International
address: Sector 26, Nr. Hanuman Mandir, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382026
description: A cozy hotel offering warm hospitality and affordable rooms.

reviews.comment: Pleasant stay. Rooms were clean and staff was friendly.
Good value for money. No complaints.

name: Hotel Midway Residency
address: 2nd Floor, Amar Complex, Near Sachivalay, Sector-14, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382014
description: A centrally located hotel offering convenient access to major attractions.

reviews.comment: Comfortable stay. Could improve on breakfast options.

name: Treebo Trend Skylon Hotel
address: Plot No 36, Sector 28, Near Pramukh Arcade, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382028
description: A modern hotel with well-appointed rooms and a rooftop restaurant.

reviews.comment: Enjoyed my stay here. The room was clean and comfortable.
Nice hotel. The rooftop restaurant has a great view.

name: Hotel Berlin
address: 108, 1st Floor, Riddhi Siddhi Complex, Sector 8, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382007
description: A budget-friendly hotel offering comfortable accommodations.

reviews.comment: Affordable stay. Rooms were basic but clean.
Decent for the price. Don't expect luxury.

name: Hotel Ashooka Inn
address: B-54, Electronic Estate, Sector 25, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382024
description: A simple yet comfortable hotel ideal for budget-conscious travelers.

reviews.comment: Good value for money. Clean rooms.
Decent hotel. Could use some updates
